unit.name: Fortification
unit.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more FORTIFICATIONS from your army:  That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol , subtract 1 from the Hit roll . Models in that unit do not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked , except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

unit.name: Tidewall Cover
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

If one or more enemy models are destroyed as a result of these mortal wounds, that enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test .

If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, that unit with this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

unit.description: This model’s twin heavy rail cannon and seeker missiles have the [ANTI-TITANIC 3+] ability while targeting a unit within half range.

composition.description: 1 AX-1-0 Tiger Shark This model is equipped with: 2 burst cannons; 2 missile pods; twin heavy rail cannon; armoured hull.

unit.name: Aggressive Deployment
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, each time a friendly model that disembarked from this TRANSPORT this turn makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll .

unit.name: Air Caste Colossus
unit.description: Each time you target this model with a Stratagem , you must spend three times that Stratagem’s stated CP cost to do so.

composition.description: 1 Manta This model is equipped with: 2 heavy rail cannons; 6 ion cannons; 2 long-barrelled burst cannon arrays; 2 missile pods; 10 seeker missiles; armoured hull.

unit.name: Coordinated Strike
unit.description: While this model is a Guided unit , each time it makes an attack that targets its Spotted unit , re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

unit.name: Super-heavy Walker
unit.description: Each time this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move, it can move over models (excluding TITANIC models) and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

composition.description: 1 Ta’unar Supremacy Armour This model is equipped with: 4 burst cannons; fusion eradicator; 3 pulse ordnance drivers; 4 smart missile systems; tri-axis ion cannon; crushing feet.

unit.name: Strafing Run
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this model has shot, select one enemy unit hit by one or more of those attacks that cannot FLY . That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test .

unit.name: Transport Bay
unit.description: The bearer has the TRANSPORT keyword and has a transport capacity of 12 TACTICAL  DRONES models.

composition.description: 1 Tiger Shark This model is equipped with: 2 burst cannons; 2 ion cannons; 2 missile pods; armoured hull; transport bay.

unit.name: Agile Dogfighter
unit.description: Each time an attack targets this model, subtract 1 from the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Barracuda This model is equipped with: 2 long-barrelled burst cannons; swiftstrike burst cannon; 2 missile pods; armoured hull.

unit.name: Turbo-jets
unit.description: Each time this unit Advances , do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of models in this unit.

unit.name: Battlesuit Support System
unit.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back , but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks .

unit.name: Shield Generator
unit.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save .

unit.name: Weapon Support System
unit.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Crisis Shas’vre 2-5 Crisis Shas’ui Every model is equipped with: burst cannon; battlesuit fists.

unit.name: Loping Stride
unit.description: Each time this model Advances , do not make an Advance roll for it. Instead, until the end of the phase, add 6" to the Move characteristic of this model.

unit.name: Baggage Harness (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly KROOT unit is within 3" of the bearer, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

composition.description: 1 Great Knarloc This model is equipped with: Great Knarloc beak and talons.

unit.name: Drone Escort
unit.description: Once per turn, in your opponent’s Shooting phase , when a friendly T’AU  EMPIRE unit within 6" of this unit is selected as the target of an attack, one unit from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, after that enemy unit has finished making its attacks, the unit using this ability can shoot as if it were your Shooting phase, but when resolving those attacks it can only target that enemy unit (and only if it is an eligible target).

unit.name: Markerlight
unit.description: The bearer has the MARKERLIGHT keyword.

composition.description: 2 Heavy Gun Drones Every model is equipped with: burst cannon; markerlight; close combat weapon.

unit.name: Thunderous Pounce
unit.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move , until the end of the turn, Knarloc beak and talons equipped by models in this unit have the [LANCE] ability.

composition.description: 3 Knarloc Riders Every model is equipped with: Kroot rifle; Knarloc beak and talons.

unit.name: Jet Pack Insertion
unit.description: At the end of your opponent’s Movement phase , one or more units embarked within this TRANSPORT can disembark from it, provided every model in each of those disembarking units has the Deep Strike ability.

composition.description: 1 Orca Dropship This model is equipped with: 2 long-barrelled burst cannons; missile pod; armoured hull.

unit.name: Battlesuit Support System
unit.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back .

unit.name: Nova Shielding
unit.description: Once per battle, when this model is selected as the target of a ranged attack, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time an attack targets this model, if the Strength characteristic of that attack is greater than the Toughness characteristic of this model, subtract 1 from the Wound roll .

unit.name: Weapon Support System
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 R’varna Battlesuit This model is equipped with: 2 pulse submunitions cannons; battlesuit fists.

unit.name: Aerial Disengagement
unit.description: Once per turn, when an enemy unit ends a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move within 9" of this unit, if this unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, it can make a Normal move of up to 6".

composition.description: 2 Remora Stealth Drones Every model is equipped with: twin long-barrelled burst cannons; 2 Remora seeker missiles; close combat weapon.
4-12 Tactical Drones Every model is equipped with: twin pulse carbine; close combat weapon.

unit.name: High-intensity Markerlights
unit.description: Each time this unit is an Observer unit , until the end of the phase, each time a model in its Guided unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit , you can re-roll the Hit roll .

composition.description: 2-4 Tetras Every model is equipped with: 2 pulse rifles; close combat weapons.

unit.name: Outflank
unit.description: When this unit arrives from Strategic Reserves , it can be set up within your opponent’s deployment zone (all other restrictions still apply).

composition.description: 1 TX42 Piranha This model is equipped with: 2 plasma rifles; armoured hull.

unit.name: Photon Casters
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this unit has shot, if an enemy INFANTRY unit was hit by one or more of those attacks, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is stunned. While a unit is stunned, subtract 2 from that unit’s Move characteristic, and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for that unit.

unit.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back , but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks .

unit.name: Shield Generator
unit.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save .

unit.name: Weapon Support System
unit.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1-2 XV9 Hazard Battlesuits Every model is equipped with: fusion cascade; twin hazard burst cannon; battlesuit fists.

unit.name: Battlesuit Support System
unit.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back .

unit.name: Nova Burst
unit.description: Once per battle, before this model makes a Normal , Advance or Fall Back move, it can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, it has a Move characteristic of 18".

unit.name: Weapon Support System
unit.description: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll .

composition.description: 1 Y’vahra Battlesuit This model is equipped with: flechette pod; ionic discharge cannon; phased plasma-flamer; battlesuit fists.
